examples.example: 妈妈买了一斤新鲜的水果，准备做一个美味的水果沙拉。

translate.english: Mother bought a catty of fresh fruit and is going to make a delicious fruit salad.

examples.example: 我今天买了一斤红彤彤的苹果，准备和朋友们一起分享。

translate.english: I bought a catty of bright red apples today and am going to share them with my friends.

examples.example: 我用一斤面粉做了许多香喷喷的馒头。

translate.english: I made a lot of fragrant steamed buns with one catty of flour.
